document.full_text: at the milken institute conference, four of the biggest names in the industry ' david rubenstein, jonathan nelson, david bonderman and leon black ' agreed on several opportunities, including china.
document.title: private equity titans find common ground
lines_and_colors: at the milken institute conference, four of the biggest names in the industry ' david rubenstein, jonathan nelson, david bonderman and leon black ' agreed on several opportunities, including china.
